query:
SELECT c.nameEn as category, COUNT(p.id) as product_count 
FROM categories c 
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId 
GROUP BY c.id, c.nameEn 
ORDER BY c.nameEn;
command:

LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId
